Title: Solutions Engineer
Description:
📝 Summary:

Department: Customer Success
Type: Permanent contract (CDI)
Experience: +5 years
Start date: As soon as possible
Location: 📍Brussels / Hybrid / Remote




You are passionate about development and love taking on challenges? You enjoy the digital world, the tech industry and a startup environment? This opportunity is for you.




Intro:

We created Chift two years ago and we want to be the European leader of financial software integrations by 2027 🚀 It’s an amazing opportunity to be part of the early builders of an ambitious and fast-growing start-up.




You will be working closely with the CCO and your actions will have a direct impact on the company and the product used by our clients. Depending on your skills and the strategy, we will prioritize the many projects you will be working on.




You will have a key role in our company as you will be at the heart of our clients' satisfaction. We seek a proactive individual who is ready to embrace responsibility, with a strong focus on assisting our customers in successfully implementing Chift’s solutions.




👨‍💻 Key Responsibilities:




You will collaborate closely with our Customer Success team, but with a strong focus on the technical aspects. From the very first onboarding meeting, you will guide clients in identifying the optimal approach to integrate Chift into their environment, ensuring they possess the necessary knowledge for successful implementation. Additionally, you will work closely with our Product & Growth teams, acting as a true facilitator to help scale the solution with our customers. In a nutshell, this is what you will do at Chift:




Supporting new customers through the onboarding process, ensuring a seamless transition to production
Designing tailored solutions with customers, leveraging Chift’s platform capabilities
Be a true pillar between Chift’s teams (Product & Growth)
Partnering with our tech team to develop and refine new integrations and features that meet client needs
Contribute to the development of technical documentation, guidelines, and best practices




🔎 Profile sought:




Minimum 3 years of experience. Startup experience in a fintech or in a similar role is a BIG plus
Technical knowledge: understand how different technical components work together (e.g. API, Security, …)
Technical experience in accounting, ecommerce, POS, invoicing or payments is a BIG PLUS!
Knowledge of APIs and integrations is a BIG PLUS!
Knowledge of SQL & Python is a PLUS!
Beyond technical knowledge, a keen interest in business logic is needed as you will have to quickly understand the client’s use cases, with the ability to translate them in technical solutions
Strong verbal/written communication and presentation skills, including the ability to effectively communicate with both business and technical teams
Strong project management skills, autonomous, strong attention to details and excellent problem-solving skills are characteristics that defines you
You should not be scared of developing supporting documentations & flows to empower your technical solutions
Thirst for knowledge; you love challenges and are eager to learn new things. Moreover, you want to understand the different technologies used to have a good overall view of the solution
Startup enthusiast: the environment is more rock and roll than a corporate job. You need to be open-minded, resourceful, curious, and enjoy collaboration
Having an ownership and "doer" spirit: the small size of the team will allow you to take the lead on different subjects
Languages requirements: French is mandatory. English and Dutch are BIG PLUS




💼 What we offer:




Full availability of our CS & Technical team to support and coach you
Steep learning curve 📈: varied work allowing you to juggle between different technologies
Experience in a young, rapidly growing tech startup 🚀 and a great atmosphere 🍻
Flexible work schedule and a mix of office/remote work
Attractive package (salary, meal vouchers, eco-vouchers, mobility budget, flexible vacation days 🏝, etc.)
Possibility of accessing equity in the next funding round 🚀
A good atmosphere in a startup means: aperitifs, lunches, and activities to celebrate each important milestone together




You see yourself in the description above? Then go ahead and send an email to henry@chift.eu. We'll schedule a call to discuss further.
